item.description:
What's New in DockFlow 1.39

UI/UX Improvements

  • New Clean Main Screen Design
    • Completely redesigned main interface with a cleaner, more modern look
    • Better visibility for actions and improved visual hierarchy
    • Clean, neutral color scheme for a more professional appearance
    • Enhanced readability and reduced visual clutter
  • Automatic Save Feature
    • All changes are now saved automatically - no more annoying Save button!
    • Streamlined workflow that saves your modifications instantly
    • Focus on what matters most: organizing your dock exactly how you want it

A Message from Our Team

These improvements are based directly on your valuable feedback. We're grateful for your continued support and promise to keep improving DockFlow to make your workflow even better. Thank you for being part of our community!
